heading: What is Javascript?
content: This JavaScript tutorial will teach you everything you need to know to get started with the JavaScript programming language.
task: Write a blog about objects and its internal representation in Javascript

heading: HTML & CSS
content: HTML and CSS are essential skills to have for a career in web development.In this video we will cover both languages from the scratch and by the end of the video you will be creating your own projects
task: Build a responsive web page with html and css styles

heading: DOM - Document vs Window
content: Learn about JavaScript DOM manipulation to add, remove, and modify elements of a website.
task: Create a web page with DOM Pagination

heading: Async Programming
content: Learn how to use Async/Await, Promises, and Callbacks in JavaScript.
task: Display countdown from 10 to 1 on the screen and then display Happy Independence day on the screen.

heading: React
content: React is one of the most popular front-end JavaScript libraries for building user interfaces. After completing this video, you will be able to build web apps in modern React, using patterns like functional components and hooks.
task: Design an UI to implement the CRUD Dashboard

heading: MySQL
content: Database management basics and SQL using the MySQL RDBMS.

heading: MongoDB
content: This video explains the basic differences between SQL and NoSQL, followed by the download and installation of MongoDB. Then we look at some of the basic commands and terminologies we must know of while working with MongoDB

heading: Node.js and Express.js
content: You will learn the fundamentals of Node and Express. Then, you will learn to build a complex Rest API. Finally, you will build a MERN app and other Node projects.
task: Create an Hall Booking System with Nodejs

heading: Node & MongoDB connectivity
content: Connecting your Node.js application to MongoDB, creating a cluster, and connecting your application to the cluster.
task: Assign mentor for each students with Node, Express and MongoDB

heading: JWT Authentication
content: A quick overview of how to sign/verify JWT tokens and place them inside a cookie to do authentication on your secured express API routes.
task: Create a login page with JWT auth
